person.persName: Mason B. Parker (Mason County Hotel owner/River Clerk)

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Hotel owner in Mason County. His father owned the hotel before him. Parker worked for many years as a clerk involved in the river trade and later as a bookeeper. The Vanceburg Courier remembered Parker as a man whose "heart was too big for his pocketbook."
